title: "The Gospel of Judas" phrase
content: I’m sure this is an easy one, but I’m curious about the font used in the phrase “The Gospel of Judas” fond in the attachement or this site: [http://www.pomwonderful.com/Gospel\_of\_Judas.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060716120642/http:/www.pomwonderful.com/Gospel_of_Judas.html)
author: holyhabanero

comments.content:
“THE GOSPEL OF” looks like good ol’ TNR, “Judas” looks like Trajan.

- Lex
